elements.2211.03213_ad9d453c7b82ead19a8041f052a2d: Classifying states as entangled or separable is a highly challenging task, while it is also one of the foundations of quantum information processing theory
elements.2211.03213_2bb80d47fa2b71b2528b1665e5427: This task is higly nontrivial even for relatively simple cases, such as two-qutrit Bell-diagonal states, i.e., mixture of nine mutually orthogonal maximally entangled states
elements.2211.03213_bccb7a9d2303ad43a46ff13739bcc: In this article we apply the Gilbert algorithm to revise previously obtained results for this class
elements.2211.03213_4d6c7922975bc863463ad266b7d2a: to argue that most states left in [Hiesmayr, B. C.
elements.2211.03213_5773ba845600c510b55092eb86ca4: , 19739 (2021)] as unknown to be entangled or separable are most likely indeed separable, or very weakly entangled
elements.2211.03213_b7e52c4546a1f1d2be8daa3265607: The presented technique can find endless applications in more general cases.
elements.2211.03213_6330dbb22318ad72f23213f269f9d: Entanglement is probably the most striking feature of quantum mechanics
elements.2211.03213_de91174c44ffd268495300100aee3: Initially, it was introduced for pure states, as notion that system are described only in reference to each other
elements.2211.03213_347354dfd13698ab7c7399692cfad: This understanding was extremely convenient, as it was immediate to recognize an entangled state, and as it turned out,
elements.2211.03213_3164260359b49349020c0bfab504f: , in the bipartite case it can be quantified uniquely as the entropy of reduced states of subsystems
elements.2211.03213_7780a3bc209a0b22bf452e791d8fc: However, as the interest in foundations of quantum information theory grew, the issue got more complicated
elements.2211.03213_1cbbd7e93e3c70ae363de1b26a159: For mixed states, it is not sufficient to study the deficit of information about individual subsystems at the expense of correlations
elements.2211.03213_2782fd19eb0f16434a2bc1de8128d: Instead, one needs to consider if the correlations can be reconstructed by means of local operations and classical communication (LOCC)
elements.2211.03213_92e9f562ec474ee03f825c7197ffa: A strong indicator of presence of entanglement in a state is a negative partial transpose (NPT)
elements.2211.03213_2e76b586e427f01d40bf4ce4e38bd: Still, it turned out, except for dimensions of subsystems
elements.2211.03213_8abb0f47bbf44b08fe2f8f6d6b719: , entangled states with positive partial transpose (PPT) exist
elements.2211.03213_7315a940c01e481cf171969992639: This form of entanglement has been recognized as
elements.2211.03213_a0feaa419e7e3767fa1e0afcca869: entanglement, which cannot be distilled to maximally entangled states (so-called Bell states)
elements.2211.03213_ae4847bb378f33588f47a64ee1048: Technically, remains an open question if bound entangled states with a negative partial transpose exists, but we will hereafter assume that all NPT entanglement is distillable
elements.2211.03213_b133988d9a57d770b86f327427972: More generally, all positive, but not completely positive maps were found to identify some form of entanglement
elements.2211.03213_6e676f3a792557a02354322df6c28: Alternatively, any entangled state yields a negative mean value of an entanglement witness operator, for which all separable (non-entangled states) give nonnegative means (Hereafter, we will adapt the opposite convention)
elements.2211.03213_ce8cc6fa75eefce52e446799efbac: The two methods happen to be related to each other by the Jamio
elements.2211.03213_0d62df56e088c8bc59424dff92c65: However, until recently there were no practical means to construct a witness tailored for a given state
elements.2211.03213_3052143e1462dd1b3063b30c26859: Further complications arose with attempts to give reasonable measures of entanglement
elements.2211.03213_b10b323358ae9d80e50df93915ce7: A list of requirements that any such measure must satisfy were formulated and two operational measures were defined: distillable entanglement
elements.2211.03213_581b6b2e913278549738db532fe75: The former quantifies the number of Bell states required to prepare a copy of a given state in the LOCC, while the latter gives the number of them in the opposite process
elements.2211.03213_a384c966b20569878ac47039a9a48: Other measures were proposed, for example with the notion of a closest separable state (CSS)
elements.2211.03213_dc70a2c56403d8220f8f62a838d6f: , or as extensions of a unique measure for pure states with a convex roof extension
elements.2211.03213_f4e70b220e1b350796f883d1f2c2a: Still, the impossibility of considering all possible state manipulation schemes, decompositions into pure states and apparent computational difficulty in computing CSS with respect to some metrics prevented all of these propositions to become universal and practical
elements.2211.03213_a5a89df3fc8efeb9e914105a38887: Modern computing techniques could be employed to the problem of separability in specific cases
elements.2211.03213_7bb1e996daa69900e0e58e66b373f: For example, there was a number of attempts to train neural networks to distiguish entagled states from separable ones
elements.2211.03213_01d7fbe2fefb34a5a3efcc1b78893: This approach poses its own set of challenges
elements.2211.03213_fad3b885a9d072757be31b7b9e304: First, as every use of machine learning (ML) techniques is application-specific, relatively little can be said about the optimality of the topology of the neural network, the form of the activation function, etc.
elements.2211.03213_5380b40344ef2971f8cdb3d17039f: The other issue is that the result of ML is dependent on the training data, which can be very limited for the entanglement-vs-separability problem
elements.2211.03213_d6c824d3515329ba94a0c71d71aa7: A network can become overtrained with a fixation on the presented pattern
elements.2211.03213_257434f992819847d34d5a58dc614: Finally, neural networks are not designed to estimate the missing continuous value of function, which makes them less capable of providing the interpolation of the amount of entanglement, although there were some attempts of such tasks
elements.2211.03213_1feffdca268a446ced94c2d8c8dd8: Recently, other strategies for classifying states as entangled or separable, based on variational algorithms
elements.2211.03213_30f61d8553f4fbe09104566f0ca99: In this articles we compare the algorithmic approach described in details below with ML results obtained by Hiesmayr
elements.2211.03213_007ed0d664f667ca49b193a9c504d: , or Bell-diagonal states of three qubits
elements.2211.03213_230c8b5c9d2ca26f27c937d20e4ee: The task is to classify states as free entangled, bound entangled, or separable
elements.2211.03213_3ad9943087b58bb921d09d34dfb58: Our methodology is decribed below, followed by a presentation of results and conclusions.
elements.2211.03213_e03181fd810d8b69aee03dc19a342: The Hilbert-Schmidt distance is defined simply as
elements.2211.03213_45ce0374c238ff0399ec31a25f200: This figure of merit has many advantages
elements.2211.03213_d948cdf28a7f22f63ebbf3357d929: Obviously, it is a well-defined distance, being just a variant of the usual Euclidean metric
elements.2211.03213_ef987a9579341ceb3f8813faf4354: It also allows to use intuitive terms from usual geometry, such as spheres, angles, or intervals
elements.2211.03213_4d13d1596973329189923bc30700a: It is also the only measure, which can be computed without a computationally expensive subroutine of matrix diagonalization
elements.2211.03213_9454db62846cccb4afe75a7ed656f: Unsurprizingly, it was suggested as a core of entanglement measure by Witte and Trucks
elements.2211.03213_cbe15d799073a01956976a8f657f9: This entanglement quantifier shall be defined as
elements.2211.03213_45117443ae2ebcc4cd260b07274e9: where the mainimum is taken over all separable states
elements.2211.03213_6875bd9294bc503040af5a0427e35: However, it was shown by Ozawa
elements.2211.03213_2140cb40cacb7de363d87dc93996e: that it does not comply with the requirement of contractivity under an operation applied to both states
elements.2211.03213_9234475c955abb387cebd170378b8: Other problems may occur when migrating a state to another Hilbert space by adding or tracing out an ancilla
elements.2211.03213_c01e398b00e6fd68bf904d18e1fb4: Still, given the advantages of Hilbert-Schmidt measure, it can be seen as an insightful quantifier of nonclassical correlations
elements.2211.03213_8ddfded79e1e9d3f520defdf8666b: has introduced an algorithm to estimate the distance between a given point and a convex set
elements.2211.03213_63b0d175900db38f4f75c2a02bd49: It was demonstrated to be useful to show the membership of a state in an LOCC equivalence
elements.2211.03213_22afc40b1654a2ad67d3476b8284f: discussed a direct use of the algorithm to estimate the distance of a given quantum state to the set of separable states
elements.2211.03213_1c9b6d6594e383079c8dcbb113710: The algorithm can be outlined as follows.

elements.2211.03213_5cb0580f0adef7d35e80a51e91299: , and provides a bound, this time lower, on the actual distance
elements.2211.03213_7671c0ec7ded745d49405b5c8b4a3: As the only one of the three, It actually certifies the presence of entanglement
elements.2211.03213_de9c16522417495a788b670352abd: However, it is more challenging computationally than it seems

elements.2211.03213_31e51d87164e3a94a35b05a59100e: This is obtainable, for example, by multiple repetitions of the maximization with randomized initial conditions
elements.2211.03213_5774f8bdb21c516120dfca4b123f5: Having taken care of it, we shall assume that we have indeed found the absolute maximum.

elements.2211.03213_8bb6fa4ddb92a57fd5208a9425f27: This, however, required preassigning a class to each state, to be changed later by the neural network.

elements.2211.03213_7b3deaaef6b800bc86342e4db09d6: Finally, let us stress low hardware requirements of the algorithm
elements.2211.03213_8995bf1331bcdaec913337b5fdb54: A typical computation time for a single state with up to 10000 corrections was around 20 minutes on an Intel Core i9-11900K processor (running sixteen single-core instances) and all instances together consumed about 1 GB of RAM at any time
elements.2211.03213_cfc133df4bca190cdf98a1d5aa565: It is thus both computationally and resource-wise efficient.
elements.2211.03213_2999e94098b44bdef239f0ecd1b7e: Until recently, even a rough classification of quantum states as separable or entangled has been a very demanding challenge, close to impossible
elements.2211.03213_797f7af8b34d5a6e175001d5d9385: However, last years have brought in a significant progress
elements.2211.03213_364f5d2bcafced7c774fb2b48f4f3: The Gilbert algorithm does not give a definite and final solution to this problem, but it can provide useful insight
elements.2211.03213_ce2f77d5cd1e349dbe5785bfb7543: First, it is able to provide incredibly precise approximations of some states, strongly hinting them as separable
elements.2211.03213_2a79ac1039c70f3630f11a6e7c96f: On the other hand, it provides entanglement witness , directly certifying nonseparability
elements.2211.03213_2207969d8efcd5e8dade30cdea3b8: This leaves few ambiguous cases of very weakly entangled states and those, for which subsequent corrections require particularly many trail states
elements.2211.03213_462b0ea3b25254babe04f4d672546: This was the case of Family
elements.2211.03213_ebaab1ef43fa71c09b4d010f2b547: In this contribution we have demonstrated that also a strictly statistical interpretation of the result utilizing
elements.2211.03213_5e8b9c8e943835fb9206e64266835: can give a reasonable approximation of a set of separable states
elements.2211.03213_543555fd725b86d4fb15283f6f9f7: In at least one case we have certified entanglement where other combined analytical, numerical, and machine learning-based techniques have failed
elements.2211.03213_ffb5f6d9b224693ab5d5aa0adcda4: can be used universally applied to identify or estimate the boundary between separable and entangled states, regardless of the dimension, the number of subsystems, or a type of quantum correlations in question
elements.2211.03213_f5c64150d1ff9483673f7afa58ea4: For example, it can find a variety of applications in solid state models
elements.2211.03213_1d7c46aa9fd7ae5715272b6b992dd: Importantly, the algorithm has not been fed with any information other than the input state
elements.2211.03213_191045aa8198d9c7aa9ba22b43e45: It is irrelevant if the state has free or bound entanglement
elements.2211.03213_6bed709e777a17d19c96a62ebc41c: The technique could be combined with machine learning and interpolation techniques, but it can also generate useful results
elements.2211.03213_8fa2d5f3fc0cd9bf06b59088b9fb5: In contrast to FREE/SEP/BOUND categorization, it provides a qualitative information about entanglement
elements.2211.03213_d184f8ac7fd3c6b89dc29095a73a4: While new bound entangled states can be easily detected, it is the question if their nonclassicality can be meaningful in an experimental realization.
